definitionList.name: RESET
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and
the gNB-DU and is used to request that the F1 interface, or parts of the F1
interface, to be reset.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU → gNB-DU and gNB-DU → gNB-CU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. of UE-associated logical F1-connections allowed to reset in one message.
  Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: RESET ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and
the gNB-DU as a response to a RESET message.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-DU → gNB-CU and gNB-CU → gNB-DU.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. of UE-associated logical F1-connections allowed to reset in one message.
  Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: ERROR INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and
the gNB-DU and is used to indicate that some error has been detected in the
node.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU → gNB-DU and gNB-DU → gNB-CU

definitionList.name: F1 SETUP REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
transfer information for a TNL association.

elementList.name: gNB-DU Served Cells List
elementList.description: List of cells configured in the gNB-DU

elementList.name: Served Cell Information
elementList.description: Information about the cells configured in the gNB-DU

elementList.name: gNB-DU System Information
elementList.description: RRC container with system information owned by gNB-DU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: F1 SETUP RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
transfer information for a TNL association.

elementList.name: gNB-CU Name
elementList.description: Human readable name of the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: Cells to be Activated List Item
elementList.description: List of cells to be activated

elementList.name: NR PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID

elementList.name: gNB-CU System Information
elementList.description: RRC container with system information owned by gNB-CU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: F1 SETUP FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
indicate F1 Setup failure.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU CONFIGURATION UPDATE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
transfer updated information for a TNL association.

elementList.name: Served Cells To Add List
elementList.description: Complete list of added cells served by the gNB-DU

elementList.name: Served Cell Information
elementList.description: Information about the cells configured in the gNB-DU

elementList.name: gNB-DU System Information
elementList.description: RRC container with system information owned by gNB-DU

elementList.name: Served Cells To Modify List
elementList.description: Complete list of modified cells served by the gNB-DU

elementList.name: Served Cell Information
elementList.description: Information about the cells configured in the gNB-DU

elementList.name: gNB-DU System Information
elementList.description: RRC container with system information owned by gNB-DU

elementList.name: Served Cells To Delete List
elementList.description: Complete list of deleted cells served by the gNB-DU

elementList.name: Cells Status List
elementList.description: Complete list of active cells

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by a
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU CONFIGURATION UPDATE ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-CU to a
gNB-DU to acknowledge update of information for a TNL association.

elementList.name: Cells to be Activated List
elementList.description: List of cells to be activated

elementList.name: Cells to be Activated List Item
NR PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID

elementList.name: gNB-CU System Information
elementList.description: RRC container with system information owned by gNB-CU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU CONFIGURATION UPDATE FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
indicate gNB-DU Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: GNB-CU CONFIGURATION UPDATE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
transfer updated information for a TNL association.

elementList.name: Cells to be Activated List
elementList.description: List of cells to be activated or modified

elementList.name: Cells to be Activated List Item
NR PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID

elementList.name: gNB-CU System Information
elementList.description: RRC container with system information owned by gNB-CU

elementList.name: Cells to be Deactivated List
elementList.description: List of cells to be deactivated

elementList.name: Cells to be Deactivated List Item
gNB-CU TNL Association To Add List
gNB-CU TNL Association To Add Item IEs
TNL Association Transport Layer Information
elementList.description: Transport Layer Address of the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: TNL Association Usage
elementList.description: Indicates whether the TNL association is only used for UE-associated signalling, or non-UE-associated signalling, or both. For usage of this IE, refer to TS 38.472 [22].

elementList.name: gNB-CU TNL Association To Remove List
gNB-CU TNL Association To Remove Item IEs
TNL Association Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Address of the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-CU TNL Association To Update List
gNB-CU TNL Association To Update Item IEs
TNL Association Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Address of the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: TNL Association Usage
elementList.description: Indicates whether the TNL association is only used for UE-associated signalling, or non-UE-associated signalling, or both. For usage of this IE, refer to TS 38.472 [22].

elementList.name: Cells to be barred List
elementList.description: List of cells to be barred.

elementList.name: Cells to be barred List Item
Protected E-UTRA Resources List
elementList.description: List of Protected E-UTRA Resources.

elementList.name: Spectrum Sharing Group ID
elementList.description: Indicates the E-UTRA cells involved in resource coordination with the NR cells affiliated with the same Spectrum Sharing Group ID.

elementList.name: E-UTRA Cells List
elementList.description: List of applicable E-UTRA cells.

elementList.name: EUTRA Cell ID
elementList.description: Indicates the E-UTRAN Cell Global Identifier as defined in subclause 9.2.14 in TS 36.423 [9].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  nunmerbs of cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

Maximum
  numbers of TNL Associations between the gNB-CU and the gNB-CU. Value is 32.

Maximum
  no. cells that can be served by an eNB. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: GNB-CU CONFIGURATION UPDATE ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-DU to a
gNB-CU to acknowledge update of information for a TNL association.

elementList.name: Cells Failed to be Activated List
elementList.description: List of cells which are failed to be activated

elementList.name: Cells Failed to be Activated Item
gNB-CU TNL Association Setup Item IEs
TNL Association Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Address of the gNB-CU

elementList.name: gNB-CU TNL Association Failed to Setup Lis
gNB-CU TNL Association Failed To Setup Item IEs
TNL Association Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Address of the gNB-CU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

Maximum
  no. of TNL Associations between the gNB-CU and the gNB-CU. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: GNB-CU CONFIGURATION UPDATE FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate gNB-CU Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-CU to a
gNB-DU, to express the desired resource allocation for data traffic, for the
sake of resource coordination. The message triggers
gNB-DU resource coordination (for NR-initiated resource coordination), to
indicate an initial resource offer by the E-UTRA node (for E-UTRA-initiated
gNB-DU Resource Coordination), or to indicate the agreed resource allocation
that is to be executed.

elementList.name: E-UTRA – NR Cell Resource Coordination Request Container
elementList.description: Includes the X2AP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST message as defined in subclause 9.1.4.24 in TS 36.423 [9].

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by a gNB-DU to a
gNB-CU, to express the desired resource allocation for data traffic, as a
response to the GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST.

elementList.name: E-UTRA – NR Cell Resource Coordination Response Container
elementList.description: Includes the X2AP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION RESPONSE message as defined in subclause 9.1.4.25 in TS 36.423 [9].

definitionList.name: GNB-DU STATUS INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate to the gNB-CU its status of overload.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
request the setup of a UE context.

elementList.name: SpCell ID
elementList.description: Special Cell as defined in TS 38.321 [16]. For handover case, this IE shall be considered as target cell.

elementList.name: Candidate SpCell ID
elementList.description: Special Cell as defined in TS 38.321 [16]

elementList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Container
elementList.description: Includes the MeNB Resource Coordination Information IE as defined in subclause 9.2.116 of TS 36.423 [9].

elementList.name: SCell to Be Setup Item IEs
SCell ID
elementList.description: SCell Identifier in gNB

elementList.name: SRB to Be Setup Item IEs
Duplication Indication
elementList.description: If included, it should be set to true.

elementList.name: DRB to Be Setup Item IEs
E-UTRAN QoS
elementList.description: Shall be used for EN-DC case to convey E-RAB Level QoS Parameters

elementList.name: DRB Information
elementList.description: Shall be used for NG-RAN cases

elementList.name: UL UP TNL Information to be setup List
UL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
UL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-CU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of UL PDUs.

elementList.name: UL Configuration
elementList.description: Information about UL usage in gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Duplication Activation
elementList.description: Information on the initial state of CA based UL PDCP duplication

elementList.name: DC Based Duplication Configured
elementList.description: Indication on whether DC based PDCP duplication is configured or not.

elementList.name: DC Based Duplication Activation
elementList.description: Information on the initial state of DC basedUL PDCP duplication

elementList.name: RRC-Container
elementList.description: Includes the DL-DCCH-Message IE as defined in subclause 6.2 of TS 38.331 [8], encapsulated in a PDCP PDU.

elementList.name: Serving PLMN
elementList.description: Indicates the PLMN serving the UE.

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: The gNB-DU UE Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate Uplink is to be enforced by the gNB-DU.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SCells allowed towards one UE,
  the maximum value is 32.

Maximum no. of SRB allowed towards one UE, the
  maximum value is 8.

Maximum no. of DRB allowed towards one UE, the
  maximum value is 64.

Maximum no. of ULUP TNL Information allowed
  towards one DRB, the maximum value is 2.

Maximum no. of SpCells allowed towards one UE,
  the maximum value is 64.

Maximum no. of flows allowed to be mapped to
  one DRB, the maximum value is 64.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
confirm the setup of a UE context.

elementList.name: C-RNTI
elementList.description: C-RNTI allocated at the gNB-DU

elementList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Container
elementList.description: Includes the SgNB Resource Coordination Information IE as defined in subclause 9.2.117 of TS 36.423 [9].

elementList.name: DRB Setup List
elementList.description: The List of DRBs which are successfully established.

elementList.name: LCID
elementList.description: LCID for the primary path if PDCP duplication is applied

elementList.name: DL UP TNL Information to be setup List
DL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
DL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-DU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of DL PDUs.

elementList.name: SCell ID
elementList.description: SCell Identifier in gNB

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of SCells allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

Maximum
  no. of SRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 8.

Maximum
  no. of DRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

Maximum
  no. of DL UP TNL Information allowed towards one DRB, the maximum value is 2.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT SETUP FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate that the setup of the UE context was unsuccessful.

elementList.name: Potential SpCell ID
elementList.description: Special Cell as defined in TS 38.321 [16]

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SpCells allowed towards one UE,
  the maximum value is 64.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
request the gNB-CU to release the UE-associated logical F1.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
request the gNB-DU to release the UE-associated logical F1 connection.

elementList.name: RRC-Container
elementList.description: Includes the DL-DCCH-Message IE as defined in subclause 6.2 of TS 38.331 encapsulated in a PDCP PDU, or the DL-CCCH-Message IE as defined in subclause 6.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SRB ID
elementList.description: It shall be included if the RRC-Container IE is present. The gNB-DU shall send the RRC message on the indicated SRB.

elementList.name: old gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Include it if RRCReestablishmentRequest is not accepted

elementList.name: Execute Duplication
elementList.description: This IE may be sent only if duplication has been configured for the UE.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMPLETE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
confirm the release of the UE-associated logical F1 connection.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
provide UE Context information changes to the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: SpCell ID
elementList.description: Special Cell as defined in TS 38.321 [16]. For handover case, this IE shall be considered as target cell.

elementList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Container
elementList.description: Includes the MeNB Resource Coordination Information IE as defined in subclause 9.2.116 of TS 36.423 [9].

elementList.name: RRC-Container
elementList.description: Includes the RRCConnectionReconfiguration message as defined in TS 38.331 [8], encapsulated in a PDCP PDU.

elementList.name: SCell to Be Setup Item IEs
SCell ID
elementList.description: SCell Identifier in gNB

elementList.name: SCell to Be Removed Item IEs
SCell ID
elementList.description: SCell Identifier in gNB

elementList.name: SRB to Be Setup Item IEs
DRB to Be Setup Item IEs
E-UTRAN QoS
elementList.description: Shall be used for EN-DC case to convey E-RAB Level QoS Parameters

elementList.name: DRB Information
elementList.description: Shall be used for NG-RAN cases

elementList.name: UL UP TNL Information to be setup List
UL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
UL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-CU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of UL PDUs.

elementList.name: UL Configuration
elementList.description: Information about UL usage in gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Duplication Activation
elementList.description: Information on the initial state of CA based UL PDCP duplication

elementList.name: DC Based Duplication Configured
elementList.description: Indication on whether DC based PDCP duplication is configured or not.

elementList.name: DC Based Duplication Activation
elementList.description: Information on the initial state of DC based UL PDCP duplication

elementList.name: DRB to Be Modified Item IEs
E-UTRAN QoS
elementList.description: Shall be used for EN-DC case to convey E-RAB Level QoS Parameters

elementList.name: DRB Information
elementList.description: Shall be used for NG-RAN cases

elementList.name: UL UP TNL Information to be setup List
UL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
UL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-CU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of UL PDUs.

elementList.name: UL Configuration
elementList.description: Information about UL usage in gNB-DU.

elementList.name: SRB To Be Released Item IEs
DRB to Be Released Item IEs
GNB-DU Configuration Query
elementList.description: Used to request the gNB-DU to provide its configuration.

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: The gNB-DU UE Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate Uplink is to be enforced by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Execute Duplication
elementList.description: This IE may be sent only if duplication has been configured for the UE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of SCells allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 32.

Maximum no.
  of SRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 8.

Maximum no.
  of DRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

Maximum no.
  of UL UP TNL Information allowed towards one DRB, the maximum value is 2.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
confirm the modification of a UE context.

elementList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Container
elementList.description: Includes the SgNB Resource Coordination Information IE as defined in subclause 9.2.117 of TS 36.423 [9].

elementList.name: DRB Setup List
elementList.description: The List of DRBs which are successfully established.

elementList.name: LCID
elementList.description: LCID for primary path if PDCP duplication is applied

elementList.name: DL UP TNL Information to be setup List
DL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
DL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-DU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of DL PDUs.

elementList.name: DRB Modified List
elementList.description: The List of DRBs which are successfully modified.

elementList.name: LCID
elementList.description: LCID for primary path if PDCP duplication is applied

elementList.name: DL UP TNL Information to be setup List
DL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
DL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-DU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of DL PDUs.

elementList.name: RLC Status
elementList.description: Indicates the RLC has been re-established at the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: SRB Failed to be Setup List
elementList.description: The List of SRBs which are failed to be established.

elementList.name: SRB Failed to be Setup Item IEs
DRB Failed to be Setup List
elementList.description: The List of DRBs which are failed to be setup.

elementList.name: DRB Failed to be Setup Item IEs
DRB Failed to be Modified List
elementList.description: The List of DRBs which are failed to be modified.

elementList.name: DRB Failed to be Modified Item IEs
SCell ID
elementList.description: SCell Identifier in gNB

elementList.name: C-RNTI
elementList.description: C-RNTI allocated at the gNB-DU

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of SRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 8.

Maximum no.
  of DRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

Maximum no.
  of DL UP TNL Information allowed towards one DRB, the maximum value is 2.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate a context modification failure.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUIRED
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
request the modification of a UE context.

elementList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Container
elementList.description: Includes the SgNB Resource Coordination Information IE as defined in subclause 9.2.117 of TS 36.423 [9].

elementList.name: DRB Required to Be Modified List
DRB Required to Be Modified Item IEs
DL UP TNL Information to be setup List
DL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
DL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-CU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of DL PDUs.

elementList.name: RLC Status
elementList.description: Indicates the RLC has been re-established at the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: SRB Required to be Released List
SRB Required to be Released List Item IEs
DRB Required to be Released List
DRB Required to be Released List Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of SRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 8.

Maximum no.
  of DRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

Maximum no.
  of DL UP TNL Information allowed towards one DRB, the maximum value is 2.

definitionList.name: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION CONFIRM
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
inform the gNB-DU the successful modification.

elementList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Container
elementList.description: Includes the MeNB Resource Coordination Information IE as defined in subclause 9.2.116 of TS 36.423 [9].

elementList.name: DRB Modified List
elementList.description: The List of DRBs which are successfully modified.

elementList.name: UL UP TNL Information to be setup List
UL UP TNL Information to Be Setup Item IEs
UL UP TNL Information
elementList.description: gNB-DU endpoint of the F1 transport bearer. For delivery of UL PDUs.

elementList.name: RRC-Container
elementList.description: Includes the RRCConnectionReconfiguration message as defined in TS 38.331 [8], encapsulated in a PDCP PDU.

elementList.name: Execute Duplication
elementList.description: This IE may be sent only if duplication has been configured for the UE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of DRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

Maximum no.
  of UL UP TNL Information allowed towards one DRB, the maximum value is 2.

definitionList.name: UE INACTIVITY NOTIFCATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to provide
information about the UE activity to the gNB-CU.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. of DRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

definitionList.name: NOTIFY
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
notify the gNB-CU that the QoS for already established DRBs associated with notification
control is not fulfilled any longer or it is fulfilled again.

definitionList.name: INITIAL UL RRC MESSAGE TRANSFER
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to transfer the
initial layer 3 message to the gNB-CU over the F1 interface.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: NG-RAN Cell Global Identifier (NR CGI)

elementList.name: C-RNTI
elementList.description: C-RNTI allocated at the gNB-DU

elementList.name: RRC-Container
elementList.description: Includes the UL-CCCH-Message IE as defined in subclause 6.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: DU to CU RRC Container
elementList.description: CellGroupConfig IE as defined in subclause 6.3.2 in TS 38.331. Required at least to carry SRB1 configuration

definitionList.name: DL RRC MESSAGE TRANSFER
descriptionList:
This message
is sent by the gNB-CU to
transfer the layer 3 message to
the gNB-DU over the F1
interface.

elementList.name: old gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Include it if RRCConnectionReestablishment is included in RRC-Container

elementList.name: RRC-Container
elementList.description: Includes the DL-DCCH-Message IE as defined in subclause 6.2 of TS 38.331 encapsulated in a PDCP PDU, or the DL-CCCH-Message IE as defined in subclause 6.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: UL RRC MESSAGE TRANSFER
descriptionList:
This message
is sent by the gNB-DU to
transfer the layer 3 message to
the gNB-CU over the F1
interface.

elementList.name: RRC-Container
elementList.description: Includes the UL-DCCH-Message IE as defined in subclause 6.2 of TS 38.331 [8], encapsulated in a PDCP PDU.

definitionList.name: WRITE-REPLACE WARNING REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU to
request the start or overwrite of the broadcast of a warning message.

elementList.name: PWS System Information
elementList.description: This IE includes the system information for public warning, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Cell to Be Broadcast Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: WRITE-REPLACE WARNING RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
acknowledge the gNB-CU on the start or overwrite request of a warning message.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: PWS CANCEL REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is forwarded by the gNB-CU to
gNB-DU to cancel an already ongoing broadcast of a warning message

elementList.name: Cell Broadcast To Be Cancelled List
Cell Broadcast to Be Cancelled Item IEs
Cancel-all Warning Messages Indicator
elementList.description: ENUMERATED (true, ...)

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: PWS CANCEL RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
indicate the list of warning areas where cancellation of the broadcast of the
identified message was successful and unsuccessful.

elementList.name: Number of Broadcasts
elementList.description: This IE is set to ‘0’ if valid results are not known or not available. It is set to 65535 if the counter results have overflowed.

definitionList.name: PWS RESTART INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
inform the gNB-CU that PWS information for some or all cells of the gNB-DU are
available if needed.

elementList.name: NR CGI List for Restart List
NR CGI List for Restart Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of cells that can be served by an
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: PWS FAILURE INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-DU to
inform the gNB-CU that ongoing PWS operation for one or more cells of the
gNB-DU has failed.

elementList.name: PWS failed NR CGI Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of cells that can be served by an
  gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: SYSTEM INFORMATION DELIVERY COMMAND
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU and is
used to enable the gNB-DU to
broadcast the requested other SI.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: NR cell identifier

definitionList.name: PAGING
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU and is used to request the gNB-DU to page UEs.

elementList.name: Paging DRX
elementList.description: It is defined as the minimum between the RAN UE Paging DRX and CN UE Paging DRX

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of paging cells, the maximum value is 512.

definitionList.name: Message Type
descriptionList:
The Message Type IE uniquely
identifies the message being sent. It is mandatory for all messages.

elementList.name: Type of Message
elementList.type: CHOICE (Initiating Message, Successful Outcome, Unsuccessful Outcome, ...)

definitionList.name: Cause
descriptionList:
The purpose of the Cause IE is to
indicate the reason for a particular event for the F1AP protocol.

elementList.name: Radio Network Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, RL failure-RLC, Unknown or already allocated gNB-CU UE F1AP ID, Unknown or already allocated gNB-DU UE F1AP ID, Unknown or inconsistent pair of UE F1AP ID, Interaction with other procedure, Not supported QCI Value, Action Desirable for Radio Reasons, No Radio Resources Available, Procedure cancelled, Normal Release, ..., Cell not available, RL failure-others, UE rejection, Resources not available for the slice)

elementList.name: Protocol Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Transfer Syntax Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Reject), Abstract Syntax Error (Ignore and Notify), Message not Compatible with Receiver State, Semantic Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Falsely Constructed Message), Unspecified, ...)

elementList.name: Miscellaneous Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Control Processing Overload, Not enough User Plane Processing Resources, Hardware Failure, O&M Intervention, Unspecified, ...)

definitionList.name: Criticality Diagnostics
descriptionList:
The Criticality Diagnostics IE is
sent by the gNB-DU or the gNB-CU when parts of a received message have not been
comprehended or were missing, or if the message contained logical errors. When
applicable, it contains information about which IEs were not comprehended or
were missing.

For further details on how to use the Criticality
Diagnostics IE, (see clause 10). The conditions for inclusion of the Transaction
ID IE are described in clause 10.

elementList.name: Procedure Code
elementList.description: Procedure Code is to be used if Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure, and not within the response message of the same procedure that caused the error.

elementList.name: Triggering Message
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(initiating message, successful outcome, unsuccessful outcome)
elementList.description: The Triggering Message is used only if the Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure.

elementList.name: Procedure Criticality
elementList.description: This Procedure Criticality is used for reporting the Criticality of the Triggering message (Procedure).

elementList.name: IE Criticality
elementList.description: The IE Criticality is used for reporting the criticality of the triggering IE. The value 'ignore' shall not be used.

elementList.name: IE ID
elementList.description: The IE ID of the not understood or missing IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. of IE errors allowed to be reported with a single message. The value for
  maxnoofErrors is 256.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU UE F1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-CU UE F1AP ID uniquely identifies
the UE association over the F1 interface within the gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-DU UE F1AP ID uniquely identifies
the UE association over the F1 interface within the gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: RRC-Container
descriptionList:
This
information element contains a gNB-CU®UE or a UE ® gNB-CU message that is transferred without interpretation in the
gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: SRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a SRB for a UE.

elementList.name: SRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the SRB-Identity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: DRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a DRB for a UE.

elementList.name: DRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the DRB-Identity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: gNB-DU ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-DU ID uniquely identifies the
gNB-DU at least within a
gNB-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU ID
elementList.description: The gNB-DU ID is independently configured from cell identifiers, i.e. no connection between gNB-DU ID and cell identifiers.

definitionList.name: Served Cell Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains cell configuration
information of a cell in the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: NR PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID

elementList.name: 5GS TAC
elementList.description: 5GS Tracking Area Code

elementList.name: Served PLMNs
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMNs

elementList.name: TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Supported S-NSSAIs per TA.

elementList.name: Measurement Timing Configuration
elementList.description: Contains the MeasurementTimingConfiguration inter-node message defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: RANAC
elementList.description: RAN Area Code

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. of Broadcast PLMN Ids. Value is 6.

definitionList.name: Transmission Stop Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the gNB-DU to stop the
data transmission for the UE.

definitionList.name: NR CGI
descriptionList:
The NR
Cell Global Identifier (NR CGI) is used to globally identify a cell.

definitionList.name: Time To wait
descriptionList:
This IE
defines the minimum allowed waiting times.

definitionList.name: PLMN Identity
descriptionList:
This
information element indicates the PLMN Identity.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: - digits 0 to 9, encoded 0000 to 1001, - 1111 used as filler digit, two digits per octet, - bits 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bits 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n -The PLMN identity consists of 3 digits from MCC followed by either -a filler digit plus 2 digits from MNC (in case of 2 digit MNC) or -3 digits from MNC (in case of a 3 digit MNC).

definitionList.name: Transmission Bandwidth
descriptionList:
The Transmission
Bandwidth IE is used to indicate the UL or DL transmission bandwidth.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.description: The values scs15, scs30, scs60 and scs120 corresponds to the sub carrier spacing in TS 38.104 [17].

elementList.name: NRB
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (nrb11, nrb18, nrb24, nrb25, nrb31, nrb32, nrb38, nrb51, nrb52, nrb65, nrb66, nrb78, nrb79, nrb93, nrb106, nrb107, nrb121, nrb132, nrb133, nrb135, nrb160, nrb162, nrb189, nrb216, nrb217, nrb245, nrb264, nrb270, nrb273, ...)
elementList.description: This IE is used to indicate the UL or DL transmission bandwidth expressed in units of resource blocks "NRB" (TS 38.104 [17]). The values nrb11, nrb18, etc. correspond to the number of resource blocks “NRB” 11, 18, etc.

definitionList.name: NR Frequency Info
descriptionList:
The NR Frequency Info defines the carrier
frequency used in a cell for a given direction (UL or DL) in FDD or for both UL
and DL directions in TDD or for an SUL carrier.

elementList.name: NR ARFCN
elementList.description: RF Reference Frequency as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.1. The frequency provided in this IE identifies the absolute frequency position of the reference resource block (Common RB 0) of the carrier. Its lowest subcarrier is also known as Point A.

elementList.name: NR Frequency Band
elementList.description: Operating Band as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.3. The value 1 corresponds to NR operating band n1, value 2 corresponds to NR operating band n2, etc.

elementList.name: Supported SUL band Item
elementList.description: Supplementary NR Operating Band as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.3 that can be used for SUL duplex mode as per TS 38.101-1 table 5.2.-1. The value 80 corresponds to NR operating band n80, value 81 corresponds to NR operating band n81, etc.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

Maximum no. of frequency bands supported for a
  NR cell. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU System Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the system information
generated by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: MIB message
elementList.description: MIB message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB1 message
elementList.description: SIB1 message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: E-UTRAN QoS
descriptionList:
This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a
DRB for EN-DC case.

elementList.name: QCI
elementList.description: QoS Class Identifier defined in TS 23.401 [10]. Logical range and coding specified in TS 23.203 [11].

elementList.name: GBR QoS Information
elementList.description: This IE applies to GBR bearers only and shall be ignored otherwise.

definitionList.name: Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList:
This IE specifies the relative importance
compared to other E-RABs for allocation and retention of the E-UTRAN Radio
Access Bearer.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE should be understood as "priority of allocation and retention" (see TS 23.401 [10]). Usage: Value 15 means "no priority". Values between 1 and 14 are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e. 1 is the highest and 14 the lowest. Value 0 shall be treated as a logical error if received.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other E-RABs Usage: The E-RAB shall not pre-empt other E-RABs or, the E-RAB may pre-empt other E-RABs The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for an E-RAB and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the E-RAB to pre-emption of other E-RABs. Usage: The E-RAB shall not be pre-empted by other E-RABs or the E-RAB may be pre-empted by other RABs. Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the E-RAB, unless modified, and as such indicates whether the E-RAB is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the maximum and
guaranteed bit rates of a GBR E-RAB for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

definitionList.name: Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the number of bits
delivered by NG-RAN in UL or to NG-RAN in DL within a period of time, divided
by the duration of the period. It is used, for example, to indicate the maximum
or guaranteed bit rate for a GBR QoS flow, or an aggregated maximum bit rate.

elementList.name: Bit Rate
elementList.description: The unit is: bit/s

definitionList.name: Transaction ID
descriptionList:
The Transaction ID IE uniquely
identifies a procedure among all ongoing parallel procedures of the same type
initiated by the same protocol peer. Messages belonging to the same procedure
shall use the same Transaction ID. The Transaction ID is determined by the
initiating peer of a procedure.

definitionList.name: DRX Cycle
descriptionList: The DRX Cycle IE is to indicate the desired DRX cycle.

elementList.name: Long DRX Cycle Length
elementList.description: This IE is defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Short DRX Cycle Length
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms2, ms3, ms4, ms5, ms6, ms7, ms8, ms10, ms14, ms16, ms20, ms30, ms32, ms35, ms40, ms64, ms80, ms128, ms160, ms256, ms320, ms512, ms640, ...)
elementList.description: This IE is defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Short DRX Cycle Timer
elementList.description: This IE is defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: CU to DU RRC Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the RRC Information that
are sent from gNB-CU to gNB-DU.

elementList.name: CG-ConfigInfo
elementList.description: CG-ConfigInfo, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: UE-CapabilityRAT-ContainerList
elementList.description: UE-CapabilityRAT-ContainerList, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MeasConfig
elementList.description: MeasConfig, as defined in TS 38.331 (without MeasGapConfig). For EN-DC operation, includes the list of FR2 frequencies for which the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to generate gaps. For NG-RAN, includes the list of FR1 and/or FR2 frequencies for which the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to generate gaps and the gap type (per-UE or per-FR).

elementList.name: Handover Preparation Information
elementList.description: HandoverPreparationInformation, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: CellGroupConfig
elementList.description: CellGroupConfig, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Measurement Timing Configuration
elementList.description: Contains the MeasurementTimingConfiguration inter-node message defined in TS 38.331 [8]. In EN-DC, it is included when the gaps for FR2 are requested to be configured by the MeNB.

definitionList.name: DU to CU RRC Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the RRC Information that
are sent from the gNB-DU to the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: CellGroupConfig
elementList.description: CellGroupConfig, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MeasGapConfig
elementList.description: MeasGapConfig as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For EN-DC operation, includes the gap for FR2, as requested by the gNB-CU via MeasConfig IE. For NG-RAN, includes the gap(s) for FR1 and/or FR2, as requested by the gNB-CU via MeasConfig IE and according to the requested gap type (per-UE or per-FR).

elementList.name: Requested P-MaxFR1
elementList.description: requestedP-MaxFR1, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For EN-DC operation, this IE should be included, as requested by the gNB-CU via CG-ConfigInfo IE.

definitionList.name: RLC Mode
descriptionList:
The RLC Mode IE indicates the RLC
Mode used for a DRB.

definitionList.name: SUL Information
descriptionList: This IE provides information about the SUL carrier.

elementList.name: SUL ARFCN
elementList.description: RF Reference Frequency as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.1. The frequency provided in this IE identifies the absolute frequency position of the reference resource block (Common RB 0) of the SUL carrier. Its lowest subcarrier is also known as Point A.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

definitionList.name: 5GS TAC
descriptionList:
This
information element is used to identify Tracking Area Code.

definitionList.name: Configured EPS TAC
descriptionList:
This information element is used to
identify a configured EPS Tracking Area Code in order to enable application of
Roaming and Access Restrictions for EN-DC as specified in TS 37.340 [7]. This
IE is configured for the cell, but not broadcast.

definitionList.name: RRC Reconfiguration Complete Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the
successful reconfiguration performed in the UE.

definitionList.name: UL Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates how the UL scheduling is configured at gNB-DU.

elementList.name: UL UE Configuration
elementList.description: Indicates how the UE uses the UL at gNB-DU, for which “no-data” indicates that the UL scheduling is not performed at gNB-DU, “shared” indicates that the UL scheduling is performed at both gNB-DU and another node, and “only” indicates that the UL scheduling is only performed at the gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: C-RNTI
descriptionList: This IE contains the C-RNTI information.

elementList.name: C-RNTI
elementList.description: C-RNTI as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Cell UL Configured
descriptionList:
This IE indicates whether
the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to configure the uplink as no UL, UL, SUL or
UL+SUL for the indicated cell for the UE.

elementList.name: Cell UL Configured
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (none, UL, SUL, UL and SUL, ...)
elementList.description: Further details are defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: RAT-Frequency Priority Information
descriptionList:
The RAT-Frequency Priority Information
contains either the Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority IE
or the Index to RAT/Frequency Selection Priority IE. These parameters
are used to define local configuration for RRM strategies.

elementList.name: Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority

definitionList.name: LCID
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies a LCID for the associated
SRB or DRB.

elementList.name: LCID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the LogicalChannelIdentity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Duplication activation
descriptionList:
The Duplication Activation IE
indicates whether UL PDCP Duplication is activated or not.

definitionList.name: Slice Support List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of supported
slices.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum
  no. of signalled slice support items. Value is 1024.

definitionList.name: S-NSSAI
descriptionList: This IE indicates the S-NSSAI.

definitionList.name: UE Identity Index value
descriptionList: This IE is used by the gNB-DU to calculate the Paging Frame.

elementList.name: Index Length 10
elementList.description: Coded as specified in TS 38.304 [24].

definitionList.name: Paging DRX
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the
Paging DRX as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: Paging DRX
elementList.description: Unit in radio frame.

definitionList.name: Paging Priority
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
the paging priority for paging a UE.

elementList.name: Paging Priority
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (PrioLevel1, PrioLevel2, PrioLevel3, PrioLevel4, PrioLevel5, PrioLevel6, PrioLevel7, PrioLevel8, ...)
elementList.description: Lower value codepoint indicates higher priority.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU System Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the system information
encoded by the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: SIB type to Be Updated List
SIB type to Be Updated Item IEs
SIB type
elementList.description: Indicates a certain SIB block, e.g. 2 means sibType2, 3 for sibType3, etc.

elementList.name: SIB message
elementList.description: SIB message containing SIB as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SIB types, the maximum value is
  32.

definitionList.name: RAN UE Paging identity
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the
RAN UE Paging identity.

definitionList.name: CN UE Paging Identity
descriptionList:
The 5G-S-TMSI is used as UE identifier for
CN paging.

elementList.name: 5G-S-TMSI
elementList.description: Details defined in TS 38.413 [3]

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Level QoS Parameters
descriptionList:
This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a
QoS flow or to a DRB.

elementList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
elementList.description: This IE shall be present for GBR QoS Flows only.

elementList.name: Reflective QoS Attribute
elementList.description: Details in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE applies to non-GBR flows only and shall be ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: PDU Session ID
elementList.description: As specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: UL PDU Session Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: The gNB-DU PDU session Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate Uplink which is to be enforced by the gNB-DU

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates QoS parameters for a GBR
QoS flow or GBR bearer for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver) in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver). Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the downlink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the uplink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

definitionList.name: Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a Non-standardised or not pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: QoS Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Packet Error Rate
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the dynamically assigned 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Delay Critical
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. This IE shall be included if the Delay Critical IE is set to “delay critical” and shall be ignored otherwise.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the GBR QoS Flow
  Information IE is present in the QoS Flow Level QoS Parameters IE.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList:
This IE specifies the relative importance
of a QoS flow or a DRB compared to other QoS flows or DRBs for allocation and
retention of NG-RAN resources.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE defines the relative importance of a resource request (see TS 23.501 [21]). Usage: Values are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e., with 1 as the highest priority and 15 as the lowest priority. Further usage is defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other QoS flows. Usage: The QoS flow shall not pre-empt other QoS flows or, the QoS flow may pre-empt other QoS flows. The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for a QoS flow and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the QoS flow to pre-emption of other QoS flows. Usage: The QoS flow shall not be pre-empted by other QoS flows or the QoS flow may be pre-empted by other QoS flows. The Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the QoS flow, unless modified and as such indicates whether the QoS flow is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of the NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: Non Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a standardized or pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the standardized or pre-configured 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [21]

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: This IE applies to GBR QoS Flows only. For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value. If the 5QI refers to a non-delay critical QoS flow the IE shall be ignored.

definitionList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Maximum Packet Loss
Rate.

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate
elementList.description: Ratio of lost packets per number of packets sent, expressed in tenth of percent.

definitionList.name: Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.5ms.

definitionList.name: Packet Error Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Packet Error Rate for
a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Scalar
elementList.description: The packet error rate is expressed as Scalar x 10-k where k is the Exponent.

definitionList.name: Averaging Window
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Averaging Window for
a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: Unit: ms. The default value is 2000ms.

definitionList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Maximum Data Burst
Volume for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: Unit: byte.

definitionList.name: Masked IMEISV
descriptionList:
This information element contains the IMEISV value with a mask, to identify a
terminal model without identifying an individual Mobile
Equipment.

elementList.name: Masked IMEISV
elementList.description: Coded as the International Mobile station Equipment Identity and Software Version Number (IMEISV) defined in TS 23.003 [23] with the last 4 digits of the SNR masked by setting the corresponding bits to 1. The first to fourth bits correspond to the first digit of the IMEISV, the fifth to eighth bits correspond to the second digit of the IMEISV, and so on.

definitionList.name: Notification Control
descriptionList:
The Notification Control IE
indicates whether the notification control for a given DRB is active or
not-active. If the notification control is set to active, the gNB-DU shall, if
supported, monitor the QoS of the DRB and notify the gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: RAN Area Code
descriptionList:
This information element is used to
uniquely identify a RAN Area Code.

elementList.name: RANAC
elementList.description: RAN Area Code

definitionList.name: PWS System Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the system information
used for pubic warning.

elementList.name: SI message
elementList.description: SI message containing only the SIBs for public warning, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE may be re-defined.

definitionList.name: Repetition Period
descriptionList:
This IE
indicates the periodicity of the warning message to be broadcast.

elementList.name: Repetition Period
elementList.description: The unit of value 1 to 217-1 is [second].

definitionList.name: Number of Broadcasts Requested
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
the number of times a message is to be broadcast.

definitionList.name: SIType List
descriptionList:
This IE is used by gNB-CU to provide SI
list of other SI for gNB-DU.

elementList.name: SI Type
elementList.description: Indicates a certain SI type required to be broadcasted by the gNB-DU.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of SI types, the maximum value is 32.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE identifies a QoS Flow within a PDU
Session. The definition and use of the QoS Flow Indicator is specified in TS
23.501 [21].

definitionList.name: Served E-UTRA Cell Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains served cell information of
an E-UTRA cell for spectrum sharing between E-UTRA and NR.

elementList.name: UL Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier for UL.

elementList.name: DL Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier for DL.

elementList.name: Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier.

elementList.name: Protected E-UTRA Resource Indication
elementList.description: Indicates the Protected E-UTRA Resource Indication as defined in subclause 9.2.125 of TS 36.423 [9].

definitionList.name: Available PLMN List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of available
PLMN.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of Broadcast PLMN Ids. Value is 6.

definitionList.name: RLC Failure Indication
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
the LCID associated with the RLC entity needing re-establishment.

definitionList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentList Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the Uplink TxDirectCurrentList information that is configured by the UE.

elementList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentList Information
elementList.description: UplinkTxDirectCurrentList as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Cell Status
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the status of a cell
served by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Cell State
elementList.description: Indicates the state of the cell. Active and Inactive cell states are defined in TS 38.401 [4]. The gNB-CU shall not activate a cell that is reported Inactive using this IE.

elementList.name: Switching Off Ongoing
elementList.description: This IE indicates that the gNB-DU will delete the cell after some time using a new gNB-DU Configuration Update procedure. When this IE is set to “True” the Cell State IE shall be set to “Active”.

definitionList.name: RLC Status
descriptionList:
This IE indicates about the RLC
configuration change included in the container towards the UE.

elementList.name: Reestablishment Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that following a change in the radio status, the RLC has been re-established.

definitionList.name: RRC Version
descriptionList:
This information element is used to
identify RRC version corresponding to TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Latest RRC Version
elementList.description: Latest supported RRC version in the release corresponding to TS 38.331 [8]. For a 3GPP specification version x.y.z, x is encoded by the leftmost byte, y by the middle byte, and z by the rightmost byte.

definitionList.name: UP Transport Layer Information
descriptionList:
The UP Transport Layer Information
IE identifies an F1 transport bearer associated to a DRB. It contains a
Transport Layer Address and a GTP Tunnel Endpoint Identifier. The Transport
Layer Address is an IP address to be used for the F1 user plane transport. The
GTP Tunnel Endpoint Identifier is to be used for the user plane transport
between gNB-CU and gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: GTP-TEID
descriptionList:
The GTP-TEID IE is the GTP Tunnel
Endpoint Identifier to be used for the user plane transport between the gNB-CU
and gNB-DU.

elementList.name: GTP-TEID
elementList.description: For details and range, see TS 29.281 [18].

definitionList.name: Transport Layer Address
descriptionList:
This Transport Layer Address IE is
an IP address.

elementList.name: Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: The Radio Network Layer is not supposed to interpret the address information. It should pass it to the Transport Layer for interpretation. For details, see TS 38.414 [19].

definitionList.name: CP Transport Layer Information
descriptionList:
This IE is used to provide the NG control
plane transport layer information associated with an NG-RAN node – AMF pair.
